item.title: War of the Worlds (HL2 Mod)
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
Dias:

I know it’s “A War of The Worlds,” and not “The War of The Worlds,” so I know several liberties could be taken but the whole mod seems disappointing with it’s complete lack of faith to the original.

I think it would be pretty nice to have a real “The War Of The Worlds” with the original 1898 setting, it would make for a nice change from all the modern, futuristic or medieval settings everything seems to use these days.

That would honestly be epic.

Read full topic

item.title: War of the Worlds (HL2 Mod)
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
I’m not impressed in the slightest. The models are pretty low detail, some more than others, and many just don’t make sense (cough rocket launcher, pump action, double barrel shotgun, and gatling tank)

I don’t know if it’s just a random background or what, but that one shot with the crawler thingy and the plants has absolutely terrible scale.

He might want to learn a little more about Blender before he goes into a career in video games.

Read full topic
